name: CareUnit
description: StructureDefinition for a custom CareUnit resource that models healthcare units such as clinics and wards.

element.short: A custom resource to represent healthcare units
element.definition: A custom resource for modeling units in healthcare such as clinics, wards, or specialized care units.
Unique identifier for the CareUnit resource.
The title or name of the care unit.
The type of care unit, such as clinic, ward, or department.

element.short: Unique identifier for the care unit
element.definition: A unique identifier string for the care unit.
Additional details about the care unit.

element.short: Parent organization of the care unit
element.definition: The organization that oversees this care unit.

element.short: Details of the facility associated with the care unit
element.definition: Facility details including address, coordinates, and label.

element.short: Contact details for the care unit
element.definition: Details for contacting the care unit, such as phone or email.

element.short: Operating hours of the care unit
element.definition: Days and times the care unit is operational.
